title: Dinnerbone: 关于末影螨
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-3-24 19:57 编辑 

A:Although Endermites are cool and all. I think it would be cooler if they were shaped differently then silverfish. 
Dinnerbone: they have a new model for the next snapshot
B:When is the next snapshot? Is it w13 or w14?
Dinnerbone: 14 at the earliest.

A:虽然末影螨很棒很强大，但如果它和蠹虫形状不一样就更酷了
Dinnerbone: 下个快照它会有不同的模形
B:什么时候发布下个快照？第13还是14周
Dinnerbone: 最早14周



解读：
下个快照还早着呢
目前的紫色末影螨是晚餐骨偷懒啦

Thx卤蛋
